message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think would be very valuable to you.  I know you're interested in this type of item, and I'm confident it would be a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a significant discount from what I would normally sell it for, and it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic product at a fantastic price.  Let me know what you think!
